English:
I see... Some mystery hacker named K feeds you
intel on the criminal that raided your account.
Chinese:
這樣啊～這樣啊～一個叫K的謎樣駭客，
給你盜取帳號犯人的相關情報——
Korean:
그렇구나~ 그렇구나~…K라는 수수께끼의 해커가
너의 계정을 사냥한 범인의 정보를 주고 있었고――
German:
Verstehe ... Ein mysteriöser Hacker namens K
gibt dir Informationen zu dem Verbrecher, der
deinen Account gestohlen hat.

English:
Then you took his one-sided invitation, went to
the Demons hideout, was mistaken for a buddy,
and now you have to spy on Zaxon... Yes, I see...
Chinese:
然後去了那傢伙單方面邀請你的惡魔巢穴，
卻被誤認為夥伴，還叫你去當Zaxon的間諜……
哈～原來如此～原來如此～
Korean:
그 놈에게 일방적인 초대를 받아 데몬즈의 아지트에 갔더니
동료로 착각돼서 잭슨에서 스파이를 하라는
명령을 받았다, 고……와~ 과연~ 그렇구나아~……
German:
Dann hast du seine Einladung angenommen, warst im
Versteck der Demons, wurdest für einen von ihnen
gehalten und musst Zaxon bespitzeln. Verstehe.

English:
...AS IF!!! Don't go walking into an obvious trap
on your own like that, stupid!
Chinese:
——喂！　你是笨蛋嗎！！
那種百分之百是陷阱的地方幹嘛一個人去啊！！
Korean:
――라니! 바보냐앗!!
그런 100퍼센트 함정인 장소로
혼자 가는게 어딨어!!
German:
... ALSO WIRKLICH!!! Du kannst doch nicht allein
in eine so offensichtliche Falle laufen,
Dummerchen!

English: ...I figured something like that was going on.
German: Ich dachte mir schon, dass so was im Busch ist.

English:
...Idiot. No more hiding. You can tell us anything
from here on out.
Chinese:
……你這個笨蛋。
以後不准再有所隱瞞，有事就說出來。
Korean:
……바보 자식이
앞으로는 숨기지 말고 뭐든지 얘기해
German:
... Du Idiot. Du darfst nichts mehr verheimlichen.
Ab jetzt erzählst du uns alles.

English:
...So now what'll we do, Ryuji? Are we really
gonna let this guy spy on them?
Chinese:
……所以，龍司，要怎麼做才好？
該不會真的要叫這傢伙去當間諜吧。
Korean:
…그런데, 어쩌지 류지.
설마 진짜로 이 녀석에게 스파이를 시킬 생각인 건 아니지?
German:
... Was machen wir jetzt, Ryuji? Lassen wir ihn
wirklich Zaxon bespitzeln?

English:
...First thing's first. We have to let Yuugo or
Fei know what's going on.
Korean: …일단은 유고나 페이에게 상황을 설명해둘 필요가 있겠군
German:
... Immer der Reihe nach. Erst müssen wir Yuugo
und Fei sagen, was Sache ist.

English:
[p], come with me. We're going to the
Zaxon Forum.
Chinese:
[p]，和我一起來。
一起去Zaxon廣場。
Korean:
[p], 너는 나를 따라와.
잭슨 포럼으로 간다
German: [p], komm mit. Wir gehen zum Zaxon-Forum.

English:
Look into K, right? You don't gotta tell me twice.
Leave it to me!
Chinese:
好啦好啦，K的調查是吧？
我知道啦。交給我吧！
Korean:
예이예이, K의 조사잖아?
알고 있다니까. 이쪽은 맡겨둬!
German:
Ich soll Nachforschungen zu K anstellen, richtig?
Das musst du mir nicht zweimal sagen.
Überlass das mir!
